trends.name: Remote Work Tools
trends.description: The rise of remote work due to the pandemic.
trends.Startup_Opportunity: Develop specialized tools for remote teams, focusing on communication, collaboration, and productivity.

trends.name: Artificial Intelligence
trends.description: The increasing use of AI in various industries.
trends.Startup_Opportunity: Create AI-based solutions for specific industry problems, focusing on automation and data analysis.

trends.name: Healthcare Technology
trends.description: The growing demand for digital health solutions.
trends.Startup_Opportunity: Develop telemedicine platforms, mental health apps, or wearable health tech.

trends.name: Sustainable Business
trends.description: The shift towards environmentally friendly practices.
trends.Startup_Opportunity: Create sustainable products or services, focusing on reducing waste, conserving resources, and promoting renewable energy.

trends.name: Online Education
trends.description: The growth of online learning due to the pandemic.
trends.Startup_Opportunity: Develop online courses, educational software, or virtual tutoring services.
